Haste, menace
Whenever Nerphrix deals combat damage to a player, create a blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Escape {B}{R}, Sacrifice two blood tokens. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)[/i]
